mapper.insert: insert into kbc_t_exception_log (id, c_exception_json, c_exception_message, c_exception_create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cExceptionJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cExceptionMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cExceptionCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, c_exception_json, c_exception_message, c_exception_create_time from kbc_t_exception_log
